6. District 5 - Jeremiah Williams

# District 5 - Jeremiah Williams

## Bio

Jeremiah Williams was born in San Francisco, CA in 1964. He was raised in 13 different foster homes from the ages of 11 to 15 years old. He has lived in Modesto, CA since 1980. Jeremiah Williams and his wife, Nancy, have two daughters, twin sons, and three grandchildren. 

### Education

- Renaissance Art School – Oakland, CA
- Tuolumne Christian School – Modesto, CA
- Modesto Junior College
- Diploma in Theology - Texas Bible College
- Leadership Modesto Graduate Modesto Chamber of Commerce  (2002)
- Associates Degree in Theology from Purpose Institute

## Committee Assignments

- Appointments Committee - Member
- Safety and Communities Committee - Chair

## Liaison Committee Assignments

- City-County Airport Advisory Committee - Alternate
- Citizens Housing and Community Development Committee - Alternate
- City's RDA Successor Agency / Stanislaus County - Alternate
- Housing Rehabilitation Loan Committee - Member
- Modesto Irrigation District Domestic Water Policy Board - Member
- Stanislaus Regional Transit Joint Powers Authority - Alternate
